entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Cochrane
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:17 a.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -8.0Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Timmins Victor Power Airport 10:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -8.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -10.6°C

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow or ice pellets. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow changing to periods of ice pellets mixed with freezing rain near noon. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of ice pellets mixed with freezing rain changing to freezing rain this evening and ending after midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 70 after midnight. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Temperature falling to zero in the morning then steady. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h. Temperature falling to zero in the morning then steady. Wind chill minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
